name: SUPERIOR SCANNING DRONES
effect: When you Scan you do not need Line of Sight as long as your target is within Sensors. Gain +1 Accuracy on Tech Attacks against Scanned targets.
description: These prototype scanner drones are being developed by the WRS as a way to provide increased information to rescue teams searching for targets buried by avalanches. They are outfitted with Radar and LiDAR technology to add to a mech’s preexisting data-capture capabilities.

name: BACKPACK HEAT GUN
effect: Basic technology developed by the WRS to be outfitted to all rescue-specced mechs, the Heat Gun allows heat to be slowly channeled from a mech’s reactor and directed to melt thick snow and ice.
